subject: Re: Gateway MT6451 - function keys
body:
I have another thing to make work: the function keys ...

in most models of laptop we can use a combination o the fn key with a 
function key to uo and do the volume, the display bright, on or off 
wireless, and more...

is there some specific module to make it work ?

sorry for the question, but this is my first linux laptop :D


--
